dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4445707Z] www.beadmaninc.com - stolen content on the website
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Austin Hamilton [mailto:austin@austinhamilton.ca] 
Sent: Thursday, June 07, 2007 12:32 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Re: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4445707Z] www.beadmaninc.com - stolen
content on the website

Hello,

We visited your website, including your DMCA page,
and we don't see how come our complaint does not "substantially"
comply with whatever "elements" you are referring to.
We identified the thief, we provided his name/address,
we identified which images are stolen, and we provided you with
URLs of our own, original images.
Please let us know what other information do you need ?

This is obvious case, more than 100 images of our artwork
were obviously copied from our website.

Please treat our case seriously, as we are prepared to go further with
our complaints (Better Business Bureau, blogs, slashdot, etc.., police,
lawyer). Cases like this are badly hurting our business, as we already
had many complains from our own customers. We are actually loosing
orders and money because of this.

Regards,
Dan Rokosz
www.austinhamilton.ca

> Originally sent on Wed Jun 06 2007 08:42PM by
austin@austinhamilton.ca: 
>  
> Hello, 
>  
> I'm writing regarding one of your customers, BeadManInc.com 
> hosted on your server (IP 66.98.208.83). 
>  
> Content displayed on the website, for example ALL images 
> displayed on this page: 
> www.beadmaninc.com/hotnew1.html 
> were created, are copyrighted, and remain a property of 
> Austin Hamilton Inc. 
> There is in total several pages of our images being displayed 
> on Beadman Inc website. 
>  
> These images were illegally stolen/copied from our own website 
> www.austinhamilton.ca (e.g. from page: 
> http://www.austinhamilton.ca/premium_beads.html 1,2,3), 
> and then displayed on BeradManInc.com website. 
>  
> These images were taken, processed and posted by us. 
> Also, all items shown on these images are owned, copyrighted 
> and trademarked property of Austin Hamilton Inc. 
>  
> We are asking you to contact your client, Beadman Inc. 
> and have them our images REMOVED from their website. 
> We would really appreciate your cooperation. 
>  
> Registrant Contact: 
>    Beadmaninc 
>    Mangal Das ( )
